title: F1 2025 team-mate battles - Who’s leading each pair at the summer break?
summary: As Formula 1's summer break starts, who’s winning the most revealing battle - the one against their own team-mate?

qa_pairs.question: Which team has the most competitive intra-team battle for the 2025 season?
What is the significance of team-mate battles in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: They reveal the relative performance and skill of drivers within the same team.
wrong_options: They determine the Constructors' Championship points.
They are used to decide pit stop timings.

qa_pairs.question: At the summer break, which driver would likely be considered leading their team-mate if they have more points?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: The driver with the most points in the championship standings.
wrong_options: The driver with the fastest lap times.
The driver who has won the most races.
The driver with the best qualifying positions.
